# Terms of Service

By utilizing this website and its associated services, you agree to the following professional terms and conditions.

## Content Attribution and Intellectual Property
All frameworks, articles, and intellectual assets on this site are the original work of Yordan Ivanov. Attribution is mandatory for any shared content or cited excerpts. Use of this material for commercial purposes requires prior written authorization. This ensures the integrity and value of the insights shared with the data leadership community.

## Professional Advisory and Coaching
Strategic advisory provides high-level guidance based on 15+ years of leadership experience and the successful navigation of four corporate acquisitions. Clients accept full responsibility for the implementation and outcomes of the strategies discussed. All session bookings and service agreements are final to ensure dedicated focus on every engagement.

## Service Scope and Integrity
I reserve the right to prioritize engagements that align with my core expertise in scaling data organizations and optimizing technical architectures. This focus ensures that every client receives the highest level of strategic value and ROI.

## User Conduct
Visitors are expected to interact with the website and community in a professional and respectful manner. The platform remains a space for high-level leadership discourse and collaborative growth.

## Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of Bulgaria. Any discussions regarding these terms will be resolved within this jurisdiction.

## Updates to Terms
These terms are subject to periodic updates to reflect the evolution of the services provided. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the current terms and professional standards.
